name: register-thalamic-segmentations
label: registerThalamicSegmentations: Register thalamic segmentations to FOD space
description: This tool takes the results of freesurfer thalamic segmentations and linearly registers them to qsirecon FOD images. Requires qsirecon output in T1w and recon all archive for the registration

targetImage.description: Image to use as a target image for the segmentation registration

thalamicSegmentationArchive.description: Thalamic segmentation archive produced by segmentthalamicnuclei gear

reconAllGearOutput.description: Input a recon all archive if you want to use bbregister method

freesurferLicense.description: Input a freesurfer license if you want to use bbregister method

registration_tool.description: Tool to use for the registration. Can be bbregister or flirt. Default bbregister.

dof.description: Degrees of freedom for the registration. Can enter 6, 9, or 12

reorient_to_std.description: Run Fsl reorient2std before registering. Should be enabled if registering to qsiprep output.

author: Ozenc Taskin
